nodes.bodyText:
There are units that do not follow those 3 types, for example in Korean:
    <unit type="concentr-milligram-per-deciliter">
        <displayName>데시리터당 밀리그램</displayName>
        <unitPattern count="other">데시리터당 {0}밀리그램</unitPattern>
    </unit>

Will that be an issue here (since it is for per patterns)?
